000_AD_PlayerTookLantern.synopsis: The Player is fighting on the side of the drider against the Harpers. The Players just picked up the lantern that Harper Lassandra wants.
000_AD_PlayerTookLantern.how_to_trigger: Join ambush combat on the side of the drider.Kill or disarm the drider so he drops the lantern.Loot and equip the lantern.Observe AD from Harper Lassandra

000_AD_DriderDropsLantern.synopsis: Drider drops lantern (either being disarmed or killed)
000_AD_DriderDropsLantern.how_to_trigger: Disarm or kill the drider during combat, forcing him to drop the lantern. Harper Lassandra must be present.

000_AD_DriderDies.synopsis: Drider dies with Harper Lassandra present

000_AD_TakesMoonlantern.synopsis: Harper takes the moolantern from the harper.

000_AD_CombatStarts.synopsis: Start ambush combat with Harper Lassandra present

000_AD_PlayerTookLantern_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
000_AD_PlayerTookLantern_0.context: InternalNodeContext: cultist' refers to the player - could be any gender

000_AD_DriderDropsLantern_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
000_AD_DriderDropsLantern_0.text: The lantern's down - we need to get it!

000_AD_DriderDies_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
000_AD_DriderDies_0.text: Got him! Now to get the lantern.

000_AD_TakesMoonlantern_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
000_AD_TakesMoonlantern_0.text: The Moonlantern's ours! Let's finish this and go home.

000_AD_CombatStarts_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
000_AD_CombatStarts_0.text: That's them! Kill the drider - take the Moonlantern!
